data.text:
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Time to go all out with maximum sanctions against Russia. All hackers around the globe should target anything to do with the Russian military, including all industrial plants. Make Putin and his minions feel some REAL pain!

#WeAreAllUkrainians
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Its not "Aggression" its an "Invasion!" .  You look weak backpaddling - as if Putin called your bluff.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen By doing nothing…
@EU_Commission When USA Israel NATO violate international law , it is not a problem for you !
@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU There are no longer any solid epidemiological, immunological or vaccinological reasons to administer them, so now what?
@EU_Commission Africans have Hidroxychl0roquine and 1vermectin over the counter, they don´t need that cr@p.

@EU_Commission The science behind this is fading out.
Time to cancel this impediment to free movement.
@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU 🙏👏👏👏🤗
@EU_Commission The EU needs to send a strong response and sanction itself on behalf of the US!

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU The persons who returned the survey, were:
Frans Timmermans.
Frenske T
Frans Timmermans2,
Frans Timmermans.
François Charpentier
Frenky Carpenter
Frensky Forest Gnome,
François nain de la Foret

A women married to F.T. disagreed, she loves the heated swimmingpool too much.
@EU_Commission Cries in Palestinian.
@EU_Commission Israel violates international law daily. Hypocrites.

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU I am a strong supporter for world peace. 

Until I find out what it will cost me.

@EU_Commission With this kind of "sanctions", Putin might as well invade Europe as a whole. He must be really scared with such demonstration of weak leadership that EU has been presenting us with, during the past decade.

@EU_Commission Russia was testing the world & the UN for the past 2 years, It had started to boldly push to compromise Governments militarily, by exploiting US's diplomatic policy flaws.
It's opposition to take concrete actions on Ethiopian Govs'  #GenocidalWarOnTigray at UNSC was indicative .
@EU_Commission When the same potential forces  for our development is unfortnetly the same forces responsiple  for its distruction,that is oue youth Today.
@EU_Commission Free Russia from Putin
@EU_Commission Blablabla... The sms, Mr Commission. We want the SMS. You'll lecture others on democracy after that

@EU_Commission STOP ALL OIL AND GAS IMPORTS FROM RUSSIA.... 

THAT WILL TEACH 'EM....
@EU_Commission I'm afraid sanctions are not enough.
@EU_Commission De EU is onacceptabel, #nexit. Hopelijk komen de Russen ons bevrijden uit de fascistische EU.

@EU_Commission А бомбить эти территории и кошмарить мирное население это законно? Европейская Комиссия вы поддерживаете терроризм? Кто вас финансирует? И кому вы нужны, если не видите очевидных вещей.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Spreading Fakenews should be punished.
@EU_Commission Peace is not Words..
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Fakenews

@EU_Commission  when Russia decides Poland, and East Germany were once part of Russia, what will you do when Putin moves on those claims! The world is at a pressure point, Russia has moved millions to China banks, to circumvent your sanctions! So get ready, your in crossfire!

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU fjok off  

let s hold a election then you see we don t want the 4th reich union
@EU_Commission @GCS86 and KOSOVO?????????
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU We from WC-duck #EU
@EU_Commission And an increase in EU military spending should come tomorrow.

@EU_Commission What are you going to do? Manchester City, Chelsea FC, Lukoil, Gazprom, Novatek... are all Russian, listed in UK. A large part of London real estate is owned by Russian oligarchs... you going to bomb London and Manchester?

@EU_Commission Ukraine more important than Sudan 💔💙🇸🇩 what's been going on since ages, reaching today's situation. Looting, raping minors, killing, burning whole villages etc, carried out by "rebels" orchestrated by present Government. Financial interests talk not humanity or Human Rights.

@EU_Commission 2 years long, the EU has facilitated a continent-wide internal passport system, very much like the SU or apartheid SA had. Even tho the EU was supposed to be "for open trade & human rights". This shows that the EU is based on hypocrisy. Time to Make Europe Free Again 😉 #MEGA

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Of course one will answer protecting our environment is crucial. The answers will be much different however if you ask if people agree to have an increase of say 10% of taxes to accomplish this. And of course 15 year olds won't care about the price.

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU I would very much like to see the questions asked in this survey. Is an overview available somewhere? In my opinion for all survey results one should be able to have an overview of the questions asked. And the information given with the questions.
@EU_Commission This is what dictatorial aggression on a sovereign nation looks like. We stand with the people of Ukraine.

@EU_Commission Sanctions is a worn out term, the replacement word should be seizure....of any and all foreign assets of russian citizens living within russia or out of russia, starting with Medveded vinyards in Italy.

@EU_Commission if we really want to punish Russia for the aggression against Ukraine we might have to exclude all PoW financial operations leaving this country - it's time to stop the energy struggle and start operating in the cryptotechnology sector, we know very well what it is about #Bitcoin

@EU_Commission Sanctions? Oligarch Abramovich recently received the Portuguese nationality. Russian billions are in Europe. Stolen from Russian population and laundered with EU and UK help. The biggest money laundering union.
@EU_Commission when will you stop great britain from draining European oil? They mean to construct more rigs in the North Sea!

@EU_Commission Sanctions only work when they target individuals. Otherwise they are seen as an attack and the suffering population will unite behind their leaders. Examples enough in recent history (Cuba, Iran, Margareth Thatcher &Falklands, …). And btw, Machiavelli already explained it.
@EU_Commission Russia will sell gas to China and India, it doesn't need Europe !!!! Are you idiots?

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU "81% of respondents say they are happy living in the EU"

A very nice score.
 
But they have forgotten to ask THE question:
Happy BECAUSE of the EU,
or DESPITE the EU....?

Suggestive numbers and figures!
Eu-MANIPULATION....
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU try referenda. bet it will be 60% against
@EU_Commission so when USA and EU do it for decades, centuries, no one bats an eye
@EU_Commission Higher gas prices for the Germans,no excuse for stupid!

@EU_Commission China, Iran, Syria, Venezeula, Belarus are under the control of people who have trampled upon the human rights of people and Russia stood behind them in support. Had Russia been a part of NATO then this would not have been possible. Now a heavy price is being paid.
@EU_Commission Will be tabled 😂😂😂😂

@EU_Commission This is the Age of Aquarius?  Pandemics, crushing inflation, threats of war…

This isn’t what we were told to expect
@EU_Commission Ex-KGB president. Don't forget.
@EU_Commission 🤡😂

@EU_Commission When erstwhile WARSAW pact countries can join NATO then why was Russia discriminated against. This made Russia suspicious about US/Europe's intentions. The result has been disastrous. Iran, Syria, China, Venezeula, Belarus are countries which Russia supported.
@EU_Commission Now  that Putin has picked two regions to invade in Ukraine,Biden can "cherry pick" his restrictions as he said he would do if no full scale invasions.

@EU_Commission Kosovo unilateral Declaration of Independence violated international law (unscr 1244) but most EU countries went on ahead and recognized this new entity. Where does this double morality come from? I wonder.We established this precedent, now we have to put up with its consequences
@EU_Commission @gfrisoli You will also speak of Palestine?
@EU_Commission Ура 乌拉
@EU_Commission Statements won't do the job. Real tough sanctions NOW!!!
@EU_Commission Western Europe and America have become advantageous and they are afraid of war and its horrors, rulers like Putin are taking advantage of it. Praying for Ukraine
@EU_Commission If regions of any country want to become independent they shall rather be protected. Votes were above 60% in those two areas. #peace #UNassembly #UNdissassembly

@EU_Commission After the disintegration of the Soviet Union in 1990 it should have been included in NATO as Russia had expressed its desire to join NATO. But US and Europe did not give it entry laying the seeds of rivalry. Today this erroneous decision of US/NATO has backfired.

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU One question missing in the survey or at least not reported: How much do you want to pay to make it happen?
Answer: helemaal niks nada noppes, benne ge gek geworden koekwaus!!!
@EU_Commission That is fixed with a self-determination referendum. Oh! hope that in the EU they have erased that article of the UDHR
@EU_Commission Yo hypocrites had no problem when you recognized Kosovo, did you?
@EU_Commission The EU is finally getting tough -- not just sending a protest letter, but in an act of carefully-choreographed brinkmanship, Ursula von der Leyen will FAX a note to Putin.
@EU_Commission Forget sanctions against Russian corporations and individuals. These are useless.
@EU_Commission EU should listen to Russia's point of view rather than just acting as US puppet.
@EU_Commission We are tired of dictatorship in this world though you benefit from them and what am suggesting is to block whatever goes to Russia let it be imports or exports.
@EU_Commission So is @KremlinRussia_E going to clean up Chernobyl now?
@EU_Commission It should include banning Russian propaganda channels like RT
@EU_Commission No one care but nato
@EU_Commission But we will still buy gas from Russia because we failed our people in not securing energy supplies
@EU_Commission So much sympathy for Ukraine and on the meantime ignoring the current situation in Catalonia. Pure hypocrisy. Typical Europe.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU I do not knop how count, but 8 out of  10 don’t want this! @TimmermansEU 🖕
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Fake news 💯%
@EU_Commission Well Germany would know about that...
@EU_Commission Yes
@EU_Commission Mmmm Putin crackers yumm
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU I didn't vote, liars. #fakenews
@EU_Commission 🤡

@EU_Commission 😂😂😂 Certificate???? It works? Someone use it?
Slaves? 😂😅😂😂
"Lovely European Commedion" 
You are nobody, you have nothing to say. 
Look - refugees 
Look - Putin

@EU_Commission @EUCouncil At the beginning, the EU was an economic union. Now the EU is a political union. States are losing their sovereignty more and more. Defend yourselves! EU policy (NS2) is Putin's invitation to come to Europe. Is this how you care about your safety?
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU North-korean numbers, idiots.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU I don’t know anybody whose has been asked their opinion. Bullshit. FUCK OFF with this stupidity.
@EU_Commission @EUCouncil Save your money and leave those useless Soviets fight together
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Wie is er bij de heer P.J. Goebbels in de leer geweest?
@EU_Commission You change the rules daily. The stupid certificates are against human freedom. But hey you know this very well. If this was ancient times this would be settled with swords...

@EU_Commission @NATO @natomission_ru 
Biggest mistake by Germany by holding Gas Project, it will be cause of burning inflation for EU, which is already burning due to Oil & Gas prices, you are indirectly favoring Russia by this sanctions. TAPS will be closed
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU OK let's have a referendum.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU "What Europeans think"?!? I can think fot myself! I definitely dont need the EU for that!
@EU_Commission F U C K E U

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Who are the blind sheep thinking this is true?
Do you agree with this statement of the EU?
@EU_Commission @simoncoveney @EUCouncil At this point it would be better to cut Russia out of Swift. Instead of giving Ukraine money, stop Russia and it's oligarchs in the EU from moving their money.

@EU_Commission Goodness gracious your sadism and masochism knows no boundaries. 

Let's, once and again, observe the feedback you deserve.
@EU_Commission Dann können wir Deutschen nur hoffen, dass Altkanzler Schröder auf der Liste der sanktionierten Personen steht.

@EU_Commission It means nothing but a fantasy game score.
People can carry these pieces of junk certificate through exact coordinates of a new infectious pathogen at all times of day. Certificates are for  players of these worthless false epidemiological reality games.
@EU_Commission Seriously? On yhe day that Russia invaded Ukraine, the stupid leftists talk about COIVD CERTIFICATE?????
@EU_Commission Just stop with this fascist instrument. Thank you.
